documents.document: @fiskeforbrains Thank you :) How's your work going?? Looks like the BRUVs are picking up lots of observations!

@SammSherman27 You should set up those BRUV's to follow the chimaeras around instead!

@physiologyfish Thank you!! :)
@WhySharksMatter How about an IOU for the next conference we both attend?!
@SammSherman27 Thanks Sam! :) Now I have heaps of time for a proper catch up! Hope you're enjoying time with the parentals
